section.title: What is MyBatis Migration Schema?
section.para: MyBatis Migrations Schema is a tool that will change the way you manage changes to your database. You can watch an amazing introductive video!!!

section.title: How can I configure my JDBC connection?
section.para: Users can configure their preferred JDBC connection in this way: ... <plugins> <plugin> <groupId></groupId> <artifactId></artifactId> <version></version> <configuration> <repository> [your migration repository] </repository> </configuration> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.derby</groupId> <artifactId>derby</artifactId> <version>10.5.3.0_1</version> </dependency> </dependencies> </plugin> ... <plugins>

section.title: How can I skip the migration goals?
section.para: Simply setting the property migration.skip to true, i.e. mvn -Dmigration.skip=true clean test
